name: Vex'd
description: '''Vex'd''' were an English [[dubstep]] duo signed to [[Planet Mu]], consisting of [[Kuedo|Jamie Teasdale]] and [[Roly Porter]]. They often played at early [[Digital Mystikz|DMZ]] nights and were some of the early pioneers of the genre. The duo released two albums: ''Degenerate'' (2005) and ''Cloud Seed'' (2010).
